name: Ship Defense (doublej42)
description:
Built in 48 hours for global game jam. This is my first game.

https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/ship-defense-0

You have a ship full of civilians that is getting attacked but it's too damaged to take off. You need to defend it and repair it so it can take off before you are overrun.

You control the Blue combat drones and Green repair drones by selecting them with left click and drag and right click to issue orders.

Drones will attack and heal in a short range.

Watch out healers are single minded and will heal the ship and ignore their own life and the life of others unless you tell them what to do.

The enemy is pressing the attack. The longer you take the more they will send. 

The healing animation does not always indicate the healing target.
